metadata.title: CVE-2013-2745 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
An SQL Injection vulnerability exists in MiniDLNA prior to 1.1.0

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-2745` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

minidlna - 1.1.2+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: minidlna package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.1.2+dfsg-1').
